title: The Machines That Built America: Snack Sized
overview: This series tells the sped-up, super-charged, half-hour history of the top innovators and brands behind the machines that built America. It thrusts viewers from the surprising beginnings all the way up to the present day and spotlights the story you didn't know and fills in blanks you didn't even know were there, from iconic names like Chevrolet, Boeing, and Harley Davidson.
